thread.section_title: Squirrelhosting Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Squirrelhosting | squirrelhosting.co.uk
thread.title: Stefan P

author: Stefan P
title: Stefan P
text:
I moved a Wordpress site from another provider to Squirrel Hosting to improve load times - largely based on reviews I'd read on this site! There were some plugin related issues during the migration - which Squirrel handled for me - all of which Jonathan worked hard to fix.
Customer service was absolutely outstanding. Quick responses to support tickets, clear explanations and all problems solved.
Oh, and the site now loads in about half the time.
